# vowels [![Donate now][donate-now]][paypal-donations]

A list with the vowels.

## Installation

```sh
$ npm i vowels
```

## Example

```js
// Dependencies
var Vowels = require("vowels");

console.log(Vowels);
// => [ 'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u' ]

```

## Press Highlights
None yet. If you wrote or found an article about this project, [add it][contributing] in this section.  :memo:

## Documentation
The module exports an array of strings represeting vowels. :sparkles:
